arts.ttl: Arsenal and Manchester City name teams for Premier League clash
arts.sum: Arsenal and Manchester City have named their teams for Sunday’s huge Premier League showdown at the Emirates. The Gunners have been boosted by the return of William Saliba from injury, with the Frenchman recalled at centre-back alongside Gabriel, who captains the side in the absence of the injured Martin Odegaard. arts.ttl: Arsenal v Manchester City: Premier League – live
arts.sum: ⚽ Premier League updates from the 4.30pm BST kick-off ⚽ Live scores | Top scorers | Follow us over on Bluesky William Saliba returns from injury for Arsenal, one of two changes from the midweek win in Bilbao. Leandro Trossard is preferred to Eberechi Eze on the left wing; Christhian Mosquera maeks way for Saliba. Oh, and Bukayo Saka is fit enough to be on the bench. Manchester City are unchanged for the third game in a row. Pep Guardiola can’t have done that too many times during his career. Continue reading...
